name: Out of Fuel!
description:
The first game jam entry by Fnessa, Yonk and Horst, for Ludum Dare 50, with the theme "Delay the inevitable".

Rules:

Your engine is running out of fuel. Collect fuel by breaking furniture and deliver it to the locomotive to delay the inevitable halt and keep your train running for as long as possible. Try to get the highest score.

Controls:

A: Move left
D: Move right
Space: Jump
S: Crouch
F: Break furniture / Deliver fuel
